Quiz.title: Marathon Preparation Quiz
Quiz.description: This quiz will help you create a personalized marathon preparation plan.

questions.title: What is your current fitness level?

answers.title: Beginner: I have little to no running experience.
answers.prompt: The person has no running experience

answers.title: Intermediate: I can run a few kilometers without difficulty.
answers.prompt: The person can run a few kilometers without difficulty

answers.title: Advanced: I regularly run longer distances (e.g., half-marathons).
answers.prompt: The person regularly runs longer distances

questions.title: Choose the duration of your marathon preparation plan.

answers.title: 8 weeks.
answers.prompt: The plan duration must be 8 weeks

answers.title: 12 weeks.
answers.prompt: The plan duration must be 12 weeks

answers.title: 16 weeks.
answers.prompt: The plan duration must be 16 weeks

questions.title: What is your primary goal for the marathon?

answers.title: Complete the marathon and cross the finish line.
answers.prompt: The person aims just to complete the marathon without a specific time goal

answers.title: Achieve a specific time goal (e.g., 4 hours).
answers.prompt: The person aims to complete the marathon in a specific time
